description.lang: DOOYA Z-Wave curtain motor is designed with exceeding commercial standards, with its exceptional quietness and user-friendly setup. Multiple control options enable the users to operate the curtain by remote, APP, or with hands. Pull to move function would be especially helpful and convenient to users who are not yet familiar with motorization. Durability in use guarantee a 10,000 times use. Additionally, the motor is more than what were mentioned above. 1. Quick set limits: the motor would set its limit positions automatically with a full ride opening and closing on the track. 2. Soft start & soft stop: A smooth running with a soft start and soft stop provide a premium visual effect. 3. Pull to move: Just do what you always did on a normal curtain, but you do not have to pull the fabric all the way to the end. Just one touch of pulling on the fabric, the motor will start running until it reaches its end. 4. If the power was gone, you can still operate the curtain as a normal curtain. When the power is back, all the settings are still there. 5. RF compatibility: Dooya Z-Wave curtain motor is also compatible with the whole range of Dooya RF remotes, various choices and a different combination would satisfy all kinds of different needs.

GROUP 1 is lifeline service that assigned to curtain motor position. It enables the curtain motor to send reports to Z-Wave Controller or Z-Wave Gateway whenever the motor is starting or stopping. The Group Support: SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_REPORT_V3 DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION
GROUP 2 allows for Send Multilevel Report to associated devices in this group.This Group Support: SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_REPORT_V3

Set the direction: This parameter can be used to set the motor rotation direction, the motor direction is forward (Configuration Value set to 0) or the opposite direction(Configuration Value set to 1), The default value is 0.
Delete the limit: This command can delete the limit that has been set for the motor.
Set to start holding hands: This parameter can be used to set the motor open hand start function(Configuration Value set to 0) or closed(Configuration Value set to 1), The default value is 0.

Configure weak electric switch mode: This parameter can be used to set the need for weak electric switch mode. Provide 4 kinds of weak electric switch mode is optional,respectively:Double-button reboundable switch(Configuration Value set to 1),Double-button not reboundable switch(Configuration Value set to 2),DC246 switch(Configuration Value set to 3),Single-button cyclic switch mode(Configuration Value set to 4),The default value is 1.

Configure strong electric switch mode:This parameter can be used to set the need of strong electric switch mode. Provide 3 kinds of weak electric switch mode is optional,respectively:Double-button not reboundable(Configuration Value set to 0) ,Hotel mode(Configuration Value set to 1),Double-button reboundable mode(Configuration Value set to 2),The default value is 0.

Read whether the total limit is set:This parameter can be used to read the motor's total limit is already set.Not set the limit(Read into the Configuration Value is 0);Already set the limit(Read into the Configuration Value is 1)

Read the device type: This parameter can be used to read the type of the motor.Motor types are divided into curtain motor(Read into the Configuration Value is 0x01), shutter(Read into the Configuration Value is 0x11), Venetian blinds (Read into the Configuration Value is 0x12)

Read the motor power supply type:This parameter can be used to read the motor power supply type.The power of motor is classified into:Mains power supply(Read into the Configuration Value is 0),battery power(Read into the Configuration Value is 1).
Manually set/cancel open borders: Manually set the open boundary of the curtain(Configuration Value set to 1), cancel manually open the border of the curtain(Configuration Value set to 0)
Cancel manually open the border of the curtain
Manually set the open boundary of the curtain
Manually set /cancel close borders: Manually set the closed boundary of the curtain(Configuration Value set to 1), cancel manually close the border of the curtain(Configuration Value set to 0).
Cancel manually close the border of the curtain
Manually set the closed boundary of the curtain
